column5: Bob had a spot on his show with the Citywide folks this morning. The guy showed what goes in to repairing a beat up prop. Nifty little piece and good advert for a great company.
~~~I've damage many a prop, and they have always brought them back to life, great work, easy on the wallet
I have had two props redone and one re pitched.The guy does excellent work,and always busy,in my mind that means good work!!
I was very happy with service. I've also bought from Lou brand new spare props for each of the 2 boats I've owned.
Good to hear,I can't see how service could get much better.
